mapper.select:
SELECT C.KEY_ID, C.EMP_ID, C.KEY_NAME, C.KEY_DESC, C.KEY_TYPE, C.KEY_VALUE1, C.KEY_VALUE2, date_format(C.KEY_VALUE3,'%Y-%m-%d') KEY_VALUE3, C.KEY_VALUE4, date_format(C.EDT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') EDT_TIME FROM T_SYS_CONFIG C
AND IS_DEL = 0
and LOWER(C.KEY_NAME) like concat('%',LOWER(#{keyName}),'%')
and LOWER(C.KEY_DESC) like concat('%',LOWER(#{keyDesc}),'%')
LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}

select count(p.key_id) from T_SYS_CONFIG p
AND IS_DEL = 0
and LOWER(p.KEY_NAME) like concat('%',LOWER(#{keyName}),'%')
and LOWER(p.KEY_DESC) like concat('%',LOWER(#{keyDesc}),'%')
